LEDI.Name: Burn
LEDI.Message: Whew!  It gets hot in here!

LEDI.Name: Burn Lite
LEDI.Message: Lots of ammo and nowhere to run...

LEDI.Name: Chute
LEDI.Message: It's like being blasted out of a cannon!  The hidden transporters take you to the closest corner.  To get the goody in the chute you must jump on it...

LEDI.Name: Delusions
LEDI.Message: Get a lock without seeing your opponent.  Run from the missles - they are slow.  Watch out for surprise attacks from above!

LEDI.Name: Delusions with Grenades
LEDI.Message: Like delusions, but with grenades (missles are less powerful but faster).

LEDI.Name: Illusion
LEDI.Message: Solidity is a state of mind...

LEDI.Name: Rush!
LEDI.Message: A small grenade blasting good time!

LEDI.Name: Ghost Town
LEDI.Message: The ammo is plentiful, but not always easy to find - and yet, the old west ain't what it used to be...

LEDI.Name: Cowboy's Tomb
LEDI.Message: The center of the tomb (the star) is a teleporter - jump to teleport!
